data: The sun fell hot upon the bosom of the Nile and clung there, vibrant, hesitating, yet aggressive, as if baffled in its desire to penetrate beneath the riverâ€™s lurid surface.
The Last Egyptian: A Romance of the Nile
Baum, L. Frank (Lyman Frank), 1856-1919; Wightman, Francis P. [Illustrator]
